oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Evans Field Cumberland Junior High School, Nashville, Tennessee, n.d.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An exterior view of the scoreboard at Evans Field at Cumberland Junior High School (3500 Hydes Ferry Road), Nashville, Tennessee, n.d. The football field and bleachers were completed and field was dedicated the Evans Field in honor of Jerry Evans, who began teaching Agriculture and coaching in 1927 and retired in 1957. Cumberland was changed to a junior high school in 1971 through a Federal Court ruling. Forms part of the Claynita Harris Slide Collection. The original is a 35 mm color transparency (2 x 2 in. slide mount)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cumberland Junior High School (Nashville, Tenn.)
